name: Cubey (nuppensudel)
description:
Hello,

Cubey is a simple Puzzle Game with 20 Levels , which can be tricky sometimes. Youre a little guy trying to get to the Portal by moving around chests in the right Place. The Puzzles reach from easy to medium-hard.

Simply Arrow-Keys for Moving .

If the Game gets some recognition , i will plan on making more levels/mechanics :)

I would appreciate every Feedback about the Game :).

Currently only available for Windows Operation Systems. More coming soon...
